name: Broccoli and Zucchini In Onion and Pickle Spices Curry. Vegan.
description: Broccoli and Zucchini in Onion and Pickle Spices Curry. A delicious, easy and healthy curry to be served hot with Rotis, puris or Naan! Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1  dry red chili or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium pan heat 2 teaspoons oil at medium low.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium pan heat 2 teaspoons oil at medium low.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the onions and cook for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the onions and cook for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in fennel, coriander, cumin, poppy, fenugreek, nigella seeds, chopped ginger and the dry red chili and cook on medium low till the onions turn golden. Add more or less spices depending on taste preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in fennel, coriander, cumin, poppy, fenugreek, nigella seeds, chopped ginger and the dry red chili and cook on medium low till the onions turn golden. Add more or less spices depending on taste preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool the onion mixture a bit and blend with a little water into a blended puree.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool the onion mixture a bit and blend with a little water into a blended puree.

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pan, add a little oil and the onion puree.
recipeInstructions.name: In the same pan, add a little oil and the onion puree.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the broccoli and zucchini, salt and sugar and mix well to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the broccoli and zucchini, salt and sugar and mix well to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for 25-35minutes on low, stirring occasionally until the curry thickens and veggies well cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for 25-35minutes on low, stirring occasionally until the curry thickens and veggies well cooked.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with Rotis, puris or Naan!(Indian flat breads)
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with Rotis, puris or Naan!(Indian flat breads)

keywords: healthy curry, spicy curry, vegan curry recipe
